mention.text: 23 nov 89 -- just as we reported this afternoon , fascist cristiani and ponce , the visible head of la tandona held a peculiar news conference which not even the cuscatlan radio network even dared broadcast
a peculiar news conference which not even the cuscatlan radio network even dared broadcast
